summary: Provides a class that encapsulates the configuration of the basic package for a groundwater flow model, handling cell boundary types, layer top and bottom elevations, initial hydraulic heads, inactive cell head values, and automatically deriving layer counts and thicknesses while validating inputs and generating the formatted data needed for model input files.
business_intent: Enable users to efficiently set up, validate, and export the essential parameters of a groundwater flow model's basic package, ensuring compatibility with simulation engines and reducing errors in model preparation.
